article.title: Army Awards General Dynamics $35 Million for Modular Artillery Charge System
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: The U.S. Army Joint Munitions and Lethality Contracting Center has awarded General Dynamics Armament and Technical Products a $35 million contract for the Load, Assemble and Pack of the M231 and M232A1 Modular Artillery Charge System.
